intelligent.title: Intelligent

diagnostic.question: Question
diagnostic.adaptiveInfo: Adaptive diagnostic: questions adjust based on your answers.
diagnostic.introTagline: Assess 12 key procurement excellence domains in 5 minutes with our AI
diagnostic.stepQuestionsInfo: The diagnostic adapts to your answers
diagnostic.adaptiveLong: Adaptive diagnostic: Following questions will adapt to your answers. If you show strengths, we'll go lighter. If we detect weaknesses, we'll explore further.
diagnostic.intelligentInfo: Intelligent diagnostic: It adapts in real time to optimize your time and precisely identify your needs.
diagnostic.fallbackStrengthsNone: No significant strengths identified. Opportunity for overall improvement.
diagnostic.fallbackWeaknessesExcellent: Excellent overall performance! Keep it up.
diagnostic.bestPracticesNote: Analysis based on current market best practices
diagnostic.deepAIAnalysisSubtitle: Contextual analysis enriched with current trends research
diagnostic.noSpecificDiagnostics: No specific diagnostic required. Your level is satisfactory across all areas.
